title: Iâ€™II Take Care of You
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I know you've been hurt by someone else
I can tell by the way you carry yourself
But if you let me, here's what I'll do
Oh, I'll take care of you
[Verse 2]
I, I loved and lost, the same as you
So you see, I know, I know just what you've been through
But if you'll let me, here's what I'll do
Oh, I just got to take care of you
[Bridge]
You won't ever have to worry
You won't ever, you won't ever have to cry
And I'll be there, and I'll be there
I'll be there, right there beside you
To dry, dry your, dry your weeping eyes
[Verse 3]
So darling, tell me, tell me that you'll be true
'Cause there's no doubt in my mind I know, know what I wanna do
And just as sure as one and one is two
Ah, whoa, I'll take care of you
Take care of you

[Bridge]
You won't ever have to worry, no, baby
You won't ever, you won't ever have to cry
And I'll be there, and I'll be there
And I'll be there, right there beside you
To dry, to dry your weeping eyes
[Verse 4]
So darling, tell me that you'll be true
There's no doubt in my mind I know, I know what I want to do
And just as sure as one and one is two
Ah, whoa, I'll take care of you
[Outro]
I'm gonna take care of you
I'm gonna take care of you, baby
Take care of you
